Name: Refinery
Rules: At the start of your turn, gain 2 credits.

Name: Orbital Bombardment
Rules: Choose a ship you control. Remove developments in that system equal to the ship's attack. If all would be removed, leave 1.

Name: Trade Envoy
Rules: Gain credits equal to twice target system's development level.

Name: Barrage
Rules: Choose a ship or station you control. It deals damage equal to its attack to each ship or station an opponent controls in that system.

Name: Ram
Rules: Destroy target ship you control. It deals damage equal to its hit points to target ship or station in that system.

Name: Mass Production
Rules: Build 3 Corvettes in a system you control.

Name: Maximum Firepower
Rules: Target ship or station gets +2 attack until end of turn, and can divide its damage between an additional target this combat.

Name: Trade Routes
Rules: At the start of your turn, gain 1 credit for each station you control.

Name: Railgun Turrets
Rules: Pay X: Target ship or station you control gets +X attack until end of turn.

Name: Targeting Systems
Rules: When assigning combat damage, you may divide damage your ships and stations deal between any number of targets.

Name: Missile Platform
Rules: Other stations you control in this system get +1 attack.

Name: Orbital Habitat
Rules: You may build an additional two developments in this system.

Name: Shipyard
Rules: You may build ships in this system.

Name: Spy Network
Rules: Target player reveals their hand. Take a card from their hand and put it in yours.

Name: Intercept Orders
Rules: Target command has no effect.

Name: Sabotage
Rules: Choose a system with a ship or station you control. Destroy target ship or station in that system.

Name: Bribery
Rules: Choose a system with a ship or station you control. Gain control of target ship.

Name: Filibuster
Rules: Take another turn after this one.

Name: Advanced Weapons
Rules: Ships and stations you control have +1 attack.

Name: Fighter Bays
Rules: Fighters you control get +1 hit point. You may build fighters in any system you control with a station.

Name: Jump Nexus
Rules: Ships you control in this system may jump an additional time this turn.

Name: Explore the Unknown
Rules: Draw two cards.

Name: Jump Stabilization
Rules: Choose a system. Ships in that system may jump directly to any system within two jumps of it.

Name: Interdiction
Rules: Ships in target system cannot jump until your next ready phase.

Name: Raise Shields
Rules: Target ship or station gets +2 hit points until end of turn, and you may redirect combat damage from one target to this ship or station.

Name: Evasion
Rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target ship this turn.

Name: Experimental Shields
Rules: Discard a card: Prevent all damage to target ship or station, and it cannot be the target of commands or abilities until end of turn.

Name: Enhanced Jump Drive
Rules: Ships you control can jump an additional time each turn.

Name: Advanced Shields
Rules: Ships and stations you control have +1 hit point.

Name: Thrill of Discovery
Rules: At the start of your turn, draw a card.

Name: Corvette
Rules: This ship can target an additional target during combat.

Name: Frigate
Rules: This ship may jump the turn it is built.

Name: Destroyer
Rules: You may redirect combat damage from one target to this ship.

Name: Cruiser
Rules: This ship may perform conquest even if the system still has opposing ships and stations.

Name: Battleship
Rules: This ship can target an additional target during combat.

Name: Carrier
Rules: When this ship jumps, up to five fighters may also jump to that system.

Name: Defense Station
Rules: You may redirect combat damage from one target to this station.
